p: The average percentage of repulsion for the essential oil was calculated and assigned according to the McDonald classification, to one of the different repellent classes varying from 0 to V: class 0 (PR < 0.1%), class I (PR = 0.1–20%), class II (PR = 20.1–40%), class III (PR = 40.1–60%), class IV (PR = 60.1–80%), and class V (PR = 80.1–100%) [ 20].
